SEARCH
Package executor.service.service.scenario

Interface ScenarioService

All Known Implementing Classes:
ScenarioHttpService
public interface ScenarioService
Interface defining the contract for managing and executing scenarios.

The ScenarioService interface declares methods for managing and executing scenarios. Implementations of this interface are responsible for providing services related to scenario management, such as retrieval, creation, updating, and execution of scenarios.

It serves as an abstraction layer for interacting with scenarios within an application, allowing for flexibility in the implementation details. It is commonly used in conjunction with classes that store or represent scenarios, as well as services responsible for their execution, such as ScenarioExecutor implementations.

Users of this interface may expect methods for CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations related to scenarios, as well as methods for initiating the execution of scenarios.

See Also:

  • ScenarioExecutor

    • saveScenario

      Saves a single scenario to the underlying storage or repository.
      Parameters:
      scenario - The scenario to be saved.

    • getScenariosByUsername

      List<Scenario> getScenariosByUsername(String username)
      Retrieves a list of scenarios associated with a specific username.
      Parameters:
      username - The username associated with the scenarios.
      Returns:
      A list of scenarios associated with the specified username.

    • getScenarioByName

      Scenario getScenarioByName(String scenarioName)
      Retrieves a specific scenario by its name.
      Parameters:
      scenarioName - The name of the scenario to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      The scenario with the specified name, or null if not found.

    • saveScenarios

      void saveScenarios(List<Scenario> scenarios)
      Saves a list of scenarios to the underlying storage or repository.
      Parameters:
      scenarios - The list of scenarios to be saved.

    • getScenariosByUsernameAndScenarioName

      List<Scenario> getScenariosByUsernameAndScenarioName(String username, String scenarioName)
      Retrieves a list of scenarios based on both the username and scenario name.
      Parameters:
      username - The username associated with the scenarios.
      scenarioName - The name of the scenario to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of scenarios matching the specified username and scenario name.
